text: Nintendomagasinet (NM) was a Swedish video game magazine. It was published between the years of 1990 and 1994.Seriesamlarna: Accessdate: 10 November 2013 The magazine contained news, reports and comics based on video games. It also had a subscriber-only "Power Player" supplement which consisted of game reviews. The comics were translations of the Nintendo Comics System comics. Later it changed to the Nintendo Power comics Super Mario Adventures and The Legend of Zelda. ==In popular culture== The first issue can be seen in the Swedish 1992 film JÃ¶nssonligan & den svarta diamanten. ==References== Category:1990 establishments in Sweden Category:1994 disestablishments in Europe Category:Magazines of Europe Category:Nintendo Category:Newspapers published in Sweden Category:1990s disestablishments in Sweden
title: Nintendomagasinet
